name: A Hero's Fall
effect:
React: After one of your characters dies: All of your characters have and ATK and AC bonus equal to the level of the dead character while in the rank the character was in.
"I do not mourn my death. Why would I mourn my son's?" - Yedraw

name: Abyssal Vermin
effect:
Mercenary * Monster * Abyssal
React: After an opposing character casts a spell: Gain the Astral trait until the end of the turn.
"Warned you." - Barricade

name: Adinia Ghenis
effect:
Elf * Scout * Ghenis
Spend React: Before an Elf makes a ranged strike roll: Until the end of the turn, that Elf has +2 to all ranged strike rolls.

name: Ahdre
effect:
Elf Warlord * Bard * Scout * Riposte +0 * Glyn
React: After one of your Elves targets an opposing character with a DC save or ranged strike, discard a card: Add +5 to the DC or ranged strike roll.
"Always learn. Always."

name: Amatria Tansiq
effect:
Elf * Assassin * Tansiq
React: Before Amatria dies from an opposing character's melee strike or action: The opposing character must make a poison save (DC 12) or suffer a wound.

name: Another Time
effect:
Fighter and Monk only. Monks do not spend to perform this action.
Spend React: After this character is wounded by a melee or ranged strike: Reduce the number of wounds by one.
"Well played, girl, but it won't save you" - Baruuk

name: Antonir Genecourt
effect:
Deverenian * Cantor * Genecourt
React: Once per turn, before a Deverenian in your army gives a bonus or penalty to AC, ATK, or Skill: Increase the bonuses or penalties on one character by 3 until the end of the turn.

name: Anyah
effect:
Free Kingdoms
React: Before Anyah dies: Target a Free Kingdoms character in this rank, who performs an extra melee strike the next time he attacks.
"Some things are worth dying for. Her, for instance." - Bradley

name: Armara the Twined
effect:
Deverenian * Mentalist * Magic Resistance +4
React: Once per turn, after Armara is targeted with an action (not a melee strike) by an opposing character: Target the character and perform the same action.

name: Aroch Helm
effect:
Helm
If this character is a Paladin, he gains Riposte +4 while targeted by strikes from characters of the opposite alignment.
"Denska must hold, men. Terak will be with us soon." - Sir Lorden

name: Atone for Your Sins
effect:
React: Before a character within one rank suffers a wound: Reduce the wounds by one. This cleric suffers one wound. At the end of the turn, remove one wound from this cleric.
"One man's sacrilege is another man's piety." - Corbas

name: Automaton
effect: Spend Order: Remove an item in your discard pile from the game: Put this card into play adjacent to the caster as a level 3 fighter with +1 Skill, 2 HP, 13 AC, ATK equal to the level of the item and Magic Resistance +4. Summoners may instead put it in an adjacent rank.

name: Bag of Caltrops
effect:
3 Charges
Spend Order: Remove a Charge token from the Bag: Until the end of the turn, any character who moves forward one or more ranks without spending or becoming stunned must succeed with a Reflex save (DC 16) or suffer a wound and become spent.

name: Barricade
effect:
Dwarf
Dwarves adjacent to Barricade have +3 AC.
"Trust me, goblin. You don't want what's behind this door..."

name: Bascaron's Call
effect:
3 Charges * Summoners do not spend to use this item, but must spend Bascaron's Call.
Spend Order: Remove a Charge token from Bascaron's Call: Discard the top card from your deck and put it in your first rank as a level 1 Elemental wizard with +0 ATK, 10 AC, 1 Hit Point and the ability, "Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike."

name: Beast Knight's Armor
effect:
Armor * Evil characters only.
React: After a character misses this fighter with a melee strike, spend Beast Knight's Armor: Perform a skill check (DC 17). If successful, inflict a wound on the opposing character.

name: Binding Wand
effect: React: After this wizard succeeds with a save from an opposing character's action, spend Binding Wand: The originating character must make a magic save with the same DC, and the same consequences of failure.

name: Blasphemous Sign
effect:
Characters adjacent to this cleric have +3 ATK.
"Say nothing of this to anyone." - Yedraw

name: Blasphemy
effect:
Dwarf * Druid * Monster * Unique * Exile * May remain spent.
Spend Order: Target an adjacent Dwarf. Until Blasphemy readies, stuns, or leaves play the Dwarf gains +3 AC, +1 HP, and the Gargoyle trait.

name: Blood and Bone
effect:
3 Charges
Order: Remove a Charge token from Blood and Bone: Perform a +0 ranged strike.

name: Borrow
effect:
Dwarf * Exile
React: After Borrow enters play, remove an item in your discard pile from play: Search your discard pile for an item Borrow can equip, and equip it.
"You'll need some help, Nitesh. You'll need me."

name: Brakil
effect:
Nothrog * Hellbringer's Legion
React: Before Brakil dies: Perform a +3 ranged strike.
"Just a little closer, Faiza?"

name: Brawl
effect:
Dwarf * Medicine +0 * Defend +4
Brawl is a cleric and a fighter. Brawl enters play as if he were level 4.
React: Immediately before Brawl is killed by a melee strike: Perform a melee strike targeting the attacking character.

name: Bruntor's Axe
effect:
Weapon * Riposte +3
If this character has at least two other items with "Bruntor's" in the title, he gains an additional strike (base +2 ATK) when attacking.
"It is a legend..."

name: Bruntor's Fist
effect:
Gauntlet
This character gains the Powerattack feat with a bonus equal to the number of equipped items he has with the word "Bruntor" in the title.
"... because the Deverenians demand legends." - Lord Halbrook

name: Bulwark
effect:
Dwarf * Defend +9
"You Nothrogs claim to be masters of warfare. Why'm I still breathing?"

name: Calea
effect:
Elf * Scout * Glyn
Spend Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike.
React: Before an Elf within one rank dies: Move forward or backward one rank or gain Marksmanship +3.

name: Calling Back Souls
effect: Order: Remove any number of cards in your discard pile from the game: Shuffle characters from your discard pile into your deck. The total levels of characters shuffled in may be not more than twice the number of cards removed from the game.

name: Carcass Wyrm
effect:
Mercenary * Unique * Dragon * Undead * Necromancer * May not equip items.
React: After Carcass Wyrm hits with a melee strike: The target must make a poison save (DC 15) or lose two levels permanently. Kill the target if this reduces him below level one.
Order: Once per turn: Move forward or backward one rank.

name: Cardinal Creigh
effect:
Deverenian Warlord * Cantor * Riposte +0
React: After a Deverenian in your army is killed by an opposing character: Put a number of charge tokens on Cardinal Creigh equal to the Deverenian's level.
Order: Remove up to 5 charge tokens: Reduce a target character's ATK and AC by the number of tokens removed.

name: Chisulo Pra
effect:
Free Kingdoms * Monk * Narawat
Chisulo Pra gains one strike per attack if he has a Weapon equipped.
"When may the world rest?"

name: Close Ranks
effect:
React: Before one of your characters in a rank in front of this one is killed: Move forward one rank.
"We live together. We fight together. We stand together. We will not fall together." - Duty

name: Collapsing Bow
effect:
Bow
Order: Spend the Collapsing Bow: Perform a +2 ranged strike.
Order: Once per turn, if this character is a Scout: Perform a +2 ranged strike.

name: Conviction
effect:
Mercenary * Seer * Exile
Spend React: After an opposing character performs a react while making melee or ranged strike: Cancel the react.
"Actually, I was a lawyer. Kerebrus found me more honest work."

name: Corbas
effect:
Free Kingdoms * Riposte +6
Markappal
"Something's brewing 'neath the mud. Best to have a care, Dukat."

name: Craft
effect:
Dwarf * Artificer * Exile
Ignore class requirements when equipping items with the Charges trait to Craft.
Spend Order: Put a charge token on an item in this army.

name: Cybille
effect:
Elf * Seer
React: After an Elf within one rank dies: Look at the top 5 cards of any deck. You may shuffle that deck.
"Behlial, my beloved mentor, is dead. The world is better off."

name: d'Ilchant Signet
effect:
3 Charges
React: After this character targets a melee strike, remove a Charge token from the Signet: Gain +4 ATK for this strike.
"Odd... Father always wore it on his right hand ..." - Porthos d'Ilchant

name: Debt of Blood
effect:
React: After a character in this rank is killed by a melee strike: This fighter targets the attacking character with a melee strike that inflicts an additional wound if it hits.
"I'll live. Will you?" - Voldas

name: Deima's Shield
effect:
Shield * Unique
This cleric has +1 level, +3 skill, and +1 Hit Point.
Order: Once per turn: Gain Medicine +4, Scribe +4, or Magic Resistance +4 until the end of the turn.

name: Devourer
effect:
Mercenary * Mentalist * Monster
Will saves from the Devourer's actions are +2 DC for each card in your hand.
Order: Once per turn, remove up to three cards in your discard pile from the game: Remove that many cards of your choice in another discard pile from the game.

name: Divine Favor
effect:
React: After a character spends to cast a spell more than two levels lower than this cleric: Ready that character.
"The storm knoweth our innocence, e'en an the Inquisition doth deny it." - Cardinal Bromin

name: Divine Fury
effect: Spend React: After an opposing character kills one of your characters: All characters have -4 AC (-8 AC if the caster is a Cantor) while in a rank with the opposing character, including the character himself.

name: Duchess Mirella
effect:
Deverenian
React: Once per turn, after Mirella is targeted with a melee strike: Redirect the strike to an adjacent character.
"Such love she inspires, that men cannot help but die for her." - Baudwyn Troubador

name: Dusan Drake
effect:
Mercenary * Bard
Spend React: After an opposing ready character moves to the front rank: Move that character to the second rank and spend it.
"Keziah? Keziiiiiaaaaah? Your father's looking for you..."

name: Duty
effect:
Dwarf Warlord * Riposte +12 * Defend +9
React: After a Dwarf in this rank is targeted with a melee strike: Make a Defend check (DC 20). If successful, redirect the strike to Duty.

name: Eirlas
effect:
Elf * Scout * Glyn
Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike.
React: Before Eirlas dies: Perform a +4 ranged strike. This can be performed while stunned.

name: Enokki
effect:
Free Kingdoms * Monk * Mentalist
React: After a melee strike targets Enokki: Look at the hand of targeting character's player.
"The whispered thoughts are useful, but incessant... I have seen Silas Tzin, Kedric. Or what's left of him."

name: Envy
effect:
Dwarf * Assassin * Seer * Unique
Envy is a cleric and a rogue. Envy enters play as if he were level 5.
React: Before making a melee strike against a spent character: The target has -3 AC.

name: Expanded Spell
effect: React: After an opposing character rolls a magic save from an action this wizard performed: An adjacent character not already targeted by the action must make a magic save with the same DC and same consequences for failure.

name: Falter Stones
effect:
3 Charges
React: After a ready character moves without spending, remove a Charge token from Falter Stones: Spend the character.
"Lose something?" - Keziah

name: Farrel Wadreth
effect:
Free Kingdoms * Scout
Spend React: After a character in the rank in front of Farrel dies: Perform a +2 ranged strike.
"Oh, look. A swampy temple ruin. Can we leave it alone just this once."

name: Favored Steed
effect:
Paladins may play this action as if they were rogues.
React: After equipping a Steed: Attach Favored Steed to the character. While it is attached, the character has Riding +5, and when this character performs an action to move forward or backward, other characters may not perform reacts.
"Good, Lucien. We're almost ready." - Terak

name: Final Prayer
effect:
React: Before this character is killed: Target another character within 1 rank. Remove one wound from the target, and the target gains ATK and AC equal to the caster's level.
"Go, Duty. Save yourselves." - Gnorrow Yaw

name: Fire of God
effect:
3 Charges
Your characters have a Skill bonus equal to the number of Charge tokens on this item.
Spend Order: Remove a Charge token from Fire of God: Target a rank. Until the end of the turn, all characters in that rank have an ATK and AC bonus equal to the level of this cleric.

name: Flesher Rites
effect:
Spend Order: Remove a character in your discard pile from the game: Put this card into play adjacent to the caster as a level 3 fighter with +1 Skill, 2 HP, 13 AC, and ATK equal to the level of the removed character.
"Useful abominations." - Ichærus

name: For the Fallen
effect:
Order: Give one of your characters an ATK and AC bonus equal to the number of characters in your discard pile.
"The Emperor wishes to rule, and that is why we will win. Even he cannot reign over the dead." - Lord Halbrook

name: Forgak
effect:
Nothrog * Wyvern Legion
Spend Order: An opposing character within two ranks must succeed with a magic save (DC 17) or suffer a wound.
"Never let an old enemy live. They know you too well." - Krun

name: Fortune's Helm
effect:
Helm
+5 Skill
"I, uh, I'll be on my way, then?" - Borrow

name: Foul Blight
effect:
Order: All characters in play have a penalty to AC and Skill equal to the number of characters in their owner's discard pile, with a maximum of -4 (-8 if this character is a Necromancer).
Laughter rang through the Sarakian badlands. "Tell your master," the voice said. "Tell your master that I know how Hate died, and who is to blame".

name: Garme
effect:
Steed * Riposte +5
Order: Spend Garme: Move forward or backward one rank.
"Of course, I taught the elves a few tricks..." - Timmuk"

name: Genecourt Initiate
effect:
Deverenian * Seer
React: Before Genecourt Initiate dies: The next melee or ranged strike targeting a character in your army is a Critical Failure.
"Alhana is dead, but Genecourt knoweth the future still." - Cardinal Bromin

name: Grend Vinn
effect:
Free Kingdoms * Cantor * Monster * Unique * May remain spent.
Spend React: After a Free Kingdoms character kills an opposing character: Until Grend readies, stuns or leaves play, the Free Kingdoms character gains a bonus to ATK, AC, and Skill, equal to the killed character's level.

name: Grieze
effect:
Nothrog * Summoner * Monster * Unique * May remain spent.
Spend React: After a Nothrog is wounded: Ready the Nothrog. Until Grieze readies, stuns, or leaves play, the Nothrog gains the ability: "React: Once per turn, after an opposing character wounds this Nothrog: Ready this Nothrog."

name: Griffin's Claw
effect:
Weapon
React: Before rolling a melee strike roll against a stunned character, spend the Claw: The roll is a Critical Success.
"A mark of distinction, a token of favor." - Envy

name: Gurk
effect:
Nothrog
React: Before Gurk dies: Adjacent Nothrogs gain +4 ATK until the end of the turn.
"He may be bad comedy, but he's our bad comedy." - Uthanak

name: Hagen
effect:
Nothrog * Assassin * Unique * Traitor
Hagen's melee strikes inflict two additional wounds against spent characters.
"And to think - they were so careful to avoid spilling Deverenian blood..."

name: Hand of Ichærus
effect:
Spend React: After an opposing character moves within two ranks of this character: Move the opposing character back one rank. If the target is ready, you may shuffle this spell into your deck.
"Take this as a warning, knight. The Kabal do not seek war, but also do not fear it."

name: Hecia
effect:
Elf * Mentalist * Scribe +2
Spend Order: Target a rank up to 2 ranks away. Each character in that rank must succeed with a magic save (DC 20) or suffer -4 Skill until the end of the turn.
"Beware the fathomless waters, Ichaerus. They hunger"

name: Hellion
effect:
Dwarf
React: Once per turn, after a melee strike targeting Hellion is redirected: Perform a melee strike.
"You've got a choice, NoThRoG. You fight Duty, or your fight me."

name: Helm of Lightning
effect:
Helm
React: After a melee strike targeting this character, spend the Helm: The opposing character must make a magic save (DC 13, 17 if the target has Armor equipped) or suffer a wound.

name: Heresk
effect:
Mercenary * Exile
React: Once per turn, after one of your characters targets another character with an action or strike: Any wounds inflicted by the action or strike may not be reduced or negated.

name: Holdout Dagger
effect:
Weapon * Fighter and rogue only.
React: Before making a melee strike roll: Equip the Holdout Dagger from your hand or an adjacent character.
"Tell him I'm busy, Drake." - Keziah

name: Huntress Volda
effect:
Free Kingdoms Warlord * Druid * Ranger * Riposte +0 * Volda is a cleric and a fighter.
React: Before Volda dies: One of your Free Kingdoms characters gains +1 level, and the Druid, Ranger and Warlord traits. You do not lose the game until the target is killed.

name: Illusory Form
effect: React: After a character within one rank is targeted by a melee or ranged strike: The attacker must make a magic save (DC 15) or the strike is canceled. You may spend one of your Illusionist after the save resolves to return Illusory Form into your hand.

name: Improved Critical
effect:
Fighter and Monk only.
React: After this character kills an opposing character with a melee strike: Attach this card to this character. While it is attached, natural 18's, 19's, and 20's count as Critical Successes for this character, and this character's Critical Successes ignore the Astral trait.

name: Inquisitor's Mask
effect:
Helm
This character and adjacent characters have a bonus to AC equal to the number of characters attached to the mask.
React: Once per turn, after one of your characters dies: Attach it to the mask.

name: Into the Tunnels
effect:
Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, all players must discard a card from their hand as a cost to perform an action that targets opposing characters.
"The tunnels are secure. Begin the descent!" - Uthanak

name: Isadran Amulet
effect:
3 Charges
Order: Once per turn, remove a Charge token from the Amulet: Gain the Astral or Ethereal trait until the end of the turn.
"Our little secret." - Lord Kestrel

name: Ivory Scepter
effect:
Weapon
Order: Spend the Ivory Scepter: Target an opposing character within 2 ranks, who must succeed with a magic save (DC 8 + number of characters in your discard pile) or suffer a wound.

name: Jelial's Bracers
effect:
Shield * Unique
This rogue has +1 level, +3 Skill, and +1 Hit Point.
Order Once per turn: Gain Riding +4, Marksmanship +4 or Stealth +4 until the end of the turn.

name: Kabyrr the Insane
effect:
Mercenary * 5 Charges
Kabyrr may not start in play.
Order: Once per turn, remove a Charge token from Kabyrr: Perform a +3 ranged strike.
Order: Move a Charge token from Kabyrr to a card in this rank.

name: Kaimir
effect:
Elf * Scribe +3 * Glyn
Kaimir is a rogue and a wizard. Kaimir enters play as if he were a level 4 character.
Spend Order: Perform two +5 ranged strikes. This action is a spell.

name: Kayle Rowan
effect:
Mercenary * Rowan
React: Before fixing an illegal rank caused by a character's death, remove a character in your discard pile from the game: Put Kayle from your discard pile in the rank in the front of the illegal one.

name: Kcal'den's Bracers
effect:
Shield * Unique
This wizard has +1 level, +6 skill, and +1 Hit Point.
Order: Once per turn: Gain Charisma +4, Scribe +4, or [/b]Magic Resistance +4[/b] until the end of the turn.

name: Kilis of Flesh
effect:
Elf * Necromancer * Monster * Unique * Tansiq * May remain spent.
Spend React: After an Elf dies: Return the Elf to play spent in the same location. The Elf gains the Undead trait, +3 ATK and 1 Hit Point. Kill the Elf if Kilis readies, stuns, or leaves play.

name: Klath
effect:
Nothrog * Sav'rukk's Legion
React: Before Klath dies: Play a level 1 Nothrog from your hand. The Nothrog gains +5 ATK.
"The war continues, with neither Krun nor Sav'rukk gaining ground..."

name: Knife After Dark
effect: React: Before a melee strike roll targeting a spent character: The strike inflicts an additional wound. After the strike, perform a Stealth check (DC 10 + target's skill) to stun the target. Assassins get a Critical Success on the strike, and may perform this action while in an opposing formation.

name: Koren Zon
effect:
Free Kingdoms * Cantor
Spend React: After a character in your army dies: Target a character in your army who gains a bonus to ATK and AC equal to the level of the killed character. If the killed character was a Warlord, the bonus lasts until the end of the next turn.

name: Kra'ake
effect:
Nothrog * Powerattack +3
React: Once per turn, after a Nothrog dies: Kraake has +5 ATK until the end of the turn.
"I came of age in the foothills outside Lukkot, but now Baraxton... Baraxton is home."

name: Krost
effect:
Mercenary * Riding +5
React: After Krost is targeted with a melee strike: Spend an equipped Steed to gain Riposte +5 until the end of the turn.
"Yedraw found him in Markappal, if the smell's any hint." - Kumbani Apolo

name: Kun Iacob
effect:
Free Kingdoms * Monk
Kun Iacob ignores Astral and Ethereal traits during melee strikes.
"The soul is the key. Redeem it, or condemn it forever. Do either at your own peril."

name: Lightning Gloves
effect:
Gauntlet * 3 Charges
Monk and rogue only.
Order: Once per turn, remove a Charge token from the Lightning Gloves: Perform an attack without spending. The strikes may only target spent characters.

name: Lightning's Iron
effect:
Weapon * 3 Charges
Spend React: Before a character suffers wounds, remove a Charge token from Lightning's Iron: Reduce the wounds by one.
"It draweth suffering as a lodestone doth draw steel." - Dallen Stormlost

name: Lord Argen d'Ilchant
effect:
Deverenian * Paladin * Unique * Riding +7 * Rellion
May perform, and is targeted by, actions as if a Warlord.
Order: Once per turn, kill a Deverenian in this rank: Ready Lord Argen.

name: Martyr's Hide
effect:
Armor * Defend +5 * Riposte +5
This character may use the Defend and Riposte feats any number of times per turn.
"History? I'll drink to that!" - Tankard

name: Mayara Wadreth
effect:
Free Kingdoms * Bard
Spend React: Before Mayara is killed by an opposing character: Ready an adjacent character.
"Oh, Farrel, you'd think we weren't any good at surviving dark gods' curses."

name: Misearean Dagger
effect:
Weapon
React: After this character hits with a melee strike: Spend all items on the opposing character.
Keziah kicked the weapon away. "I've already got some, thanks."

name: Naia Calix
effect:
Elf * Calix
Naia has +1 level for casting spells.
"Distant cousins hold so much potential - not just for talent, but for ambition." - Ichaerus

name: Naines
effect:
Elf * Nimbic
Spend Order: Remove any number of cards in your discard pile from the game: Retrieve an item from the discard pile with a level equal to or lower than the combined levels of the cards removed and put it in your hand.

name: Nalak
effect:
Nothrog * Wyvern Legion
Spend React: After a character within one rank makes a melee strike: That character must succeed with a poison save (DC 12) or suffer a wound.

name: Necklace of Fireballs
effect:
3 Charges
Spend Order: Remove a Charge token from the Necklace: Perform a +4 ranged strike. After the ranged strike, the character(s) adjacent to the target must succeed with a magic save (DC 9) or suffer one wound. You may remove another Charge token instead of spending.

name: Nekrast
effect:
Elf * Necromancer * Undead * Unique
Spend Order: Remove a number of cards in your discard pile from the game: Put an Elf into play from your discard pile with a level lower than the number of cards removed.

name: Never Fade Away
effect:
React: After one of your characters dies: The character or characters who were adjacent to him gain an AC bonus equal to the dead character's skill.
"Let's go to work." - Duty

name: Nightmist Bow
effect:
Bow * Scout only.
Spend Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike.
React: After a ranged strike targeting this character: Perform a +5 ranged strike targeting the character who performed the ranged strike.

name: No Surrender!
effect:
React: Before making a melee strike roll: Gain an ATK bonus for this strike equal to the number of characters in your discard pile.
"Acceptable terms." - Sorceress Ygraine

name: Nothing to Lose
effect:
Fighter and Rogue only.
React: After an adjacent character dies: Gain +4 AC if this is a rogue and +3 ATK if this is a fighter.
"Denskans know not honor, nor wit enough to kneel 'stead of taking up arms anew." - Cardinal Creigh

name: Novice Matthias
effect:
Deverenian * Cantor
React: Once per turn, after a character in this rank suffers a wound: The character who wounded him suffers -4 AC until the end of the turn.
"Not all hymns are of praise."

name: Pain Conduit
effect:
Unique * Cursed
Before another character in your army suffers wounds which are not a cost, reduce the wounds by one and this character suffers a wound.
Spend Order: Discard Pain Conduit.

name: Penitence
effect:
Dwarf * Seer
Spend React: After a character within two ranks suffers a penalty to AC, ATK, or Skill from an action: That character suffers an additional -2 to the same stats until the end of the turn.

name: Playing Dead
effect:
Monk and Rogue only.
React: Before this character is killed by a card effect or receiving wounds, discard a card and move back a rank: The wounds are reduced to zero and this character does not die.
"Keep going, if you know what's good for you?"

name: Porthos d'Ilchant
effect:
Deverenian * Paladin * Rellion
React: After an adjacent character is killed by an opposing character: Perform a melee strike targeting the opposing character.

name: Prismatic Surge
effect: Spend Order: Target a character within two ranks. That character must make a magic save (DC 8 + caster's Skill) or suffer two wounds. Adjacent characters each must make a magic save (DC 0 + caster's Skill) or suffer two wounds.

name: Provider
effect:
Dwarf
React: Before Provider is killed by an opposing character: Dwarves in this rank gain +3 AC.
"My friends will avenge me, Nothrog. Will yours?"

name: Rage Collar
effect:
Spend Order: Perform a melee strike against each opposing character in an adjacent rank.
"They're hellborn, but I know Hell better than they?" - Kul of Clan Tergoth

name: Retaliation
effect: React: After an opposing character performs a react during a melee strike by or targeting this charater: Perform a melee strike targeting the reacting character.

name: Retribution
effect: React: After an opposing character wounds one of your characters with the same alignment as this cleric: The opposing character must make a magic save (DC 13 + wounded character's level). If unsuccessful, he suffers a wound if the caster is evil, and becomes stunned if the caster is good.

name: Return Fire
effect:
React: After a ranged strike targeting this character resolves: Perform a +5 ranged strike targeting the originating character.
"Try aiming next time." - Kaimir

name: Rielya the Merciful
effect:
Deverenian * Illusionist * Monster * Unique * May remain spent.
Spend Order: Until Crieh readies, stuns, or leaves play target Deverenian may not be targeted by melee strikes from lower level characters if they could legally target another character.

name: Robin Jirar
effect:
Free Kingdoms * Unique * Ranger * Scout * Marksmanship +4
Robin is a fighter and a rogue. Robin enters play as a level 5.
Spend Order: Perform a +6 ranged strike.
Order: Once per turn: Move forward or backward one rank.

name: Roxx
effect:
Steed
Order: Spend Roxx: Move forward one rank.
React: Before this character leaves play: Roxx enters play in this rank as a level 3 fighter with +5 ATK, 12 AC, +2 Skill and 1 Hit Point.

name: Sabotage
effect:
Spend React: After costs for an action printed on an item are paid: Cancel the action and stun the item.
"Ingrate. And after all my hard work in giving it to you?" - Borrow

name: Sethra the Spark
effect:
Deverenian * Summoner * Illusionist * May remain spent.
Spend Order: Put the top card of your deck into rank 1 as a Level 1 Astral fighter with +1 ATK, 1 AC, +1 Skill, and 1 HP, which dies if Sethra readies, stuns, or leaves play.

name: Severed of Flesh
effect: React: After one of your unstunned characters dies, before fixing ranks: Return the character to play in the same location with the Undead trait and one Hit Point. If the caster is not a Necromancer, spend the target.

name: Shallow Graves
effect: Spend Order: Place one character (up to two if the caster is a Necromancer) from an opposing discard pile face down in your first rank as a level 1 Undead Skeleton with +3 ATK, 10 AC, +1 Skill, and 1 HP. At the end of the turn, if the caster is not an Elf, return the character to the owner's discard pile.

name: Sienne Lahr
effect:
Free Kingdoms
React: Before Sienne dies: Target a number of characters in your army up to Sienne's level. Until the end of the turn, they each get an extra strike when attacking.

name: Sir Edgard Rellion
effect:
Deverenian * Paladin * Rellion
React: After you lose initiative by 5 or more: Move forward one rank.
React: After you win initiave by 5 or more: Perform an attack (spending as usual).

name: Sir Tython's Shield
effect:
Shield * Unique
This fighter has +1 level and +1 Hit Point.
Order: Once per turn, gain Powerattack +6, Defend +6 or Riposte +6 until the end of the turn.
"I never laid finger on him, but I slew him all the same..." - Maxmilian

name: Skash
effect:
Nothrog * Powerattack +4 * Wyvern Legion
React: Before Skash dies: Target a Nothrog. Until the end of the turn the Nothrog inflicts an additional wound with melee strikes.

name: Sken
effect:
Nothrog * Hellbringer's Legion
React: Before Sken dies: Perform a melee strike which can only target a spent character.
"As if the damned Sarakians weren't bad enough. Tell Sceth that someone woke up something old? something bad?"

name: Skyyrek
effect:
Elf * Necromancer * Dythanus
React: Before Skyyrek dies, remove him from the game: Retrieve a lower-level Undead Elf from the discard pile and put it in play. This action may be performed while stunned.

name: Skørr
effect:
Mercenary * Ranger
React: After an opposing character moves without spending: Put Skørr into play from your hand.
"If Hellbringer pays me enough, I'll find the Archmage, too."

name: Slag Gargoyle
effect:
Dwarf * Gargoyle
You must have a cleric in your army to start with Slag Gargoyle or bring it into play. Slag Gargoyle has +2 AC for each other type of Gargoyle in the same rank.
"Whatever's handy. No time to be picky." - Providence

name: Soul Charge
effect:
Spend Order: Target a card within one rank with the Charges trait. Put a number of charge tokens on the card equal to this character's level or the charge value, whichever is less.
"The fallen are only good for one thing..." - Vakeros

name: Squire Trevet
effect:
Deverenian * Riposte +4
React: After Trevet is targeted with a melee strike: Use the Riposte feat.
"Secure the lines to Denska, and a knighthood is thine." - Lord Gahid Rellion

name: St. Leda's Hammer
effect:
Weapon
React: After targeting a melee strike, spend the Hammer: If this cleric is a Gargoyle, the strike inflicts an extra wound if it hits.
React: After targeting a melee strike, spend the Hammer: If the target has the opposite alignment, the strike inflicts an extra wound if it hits.

name: Static Robes
effect:
Armor
This wizard can't be stunned by card effects from opposing characters.
Spend Order: Target a character up to 3 ranks away who must succeed with a magic save or become stunned.

name: Stones of Corrosion
effect:
3 Charges
Spend Order: Remove a Charge token from the Stones of Corrosion: Target an item within two ranks and make a Stealth check (DC 8 + level of item). If successful, discard the item. Otherwise, suffer a wound.

name: Storm's Aegis
effect: Spend Order: Target a rank. Until the end of the turn, opposing characters may not play reacts during actions which target characters in that rank. Melee and ranged strikes against these characters inflict one less wound, with a minimum of one.

name: Tadin the Light
effect:
Deverenian * Illusionist * Myerdeth
React: Before a higher-level Deverenian in this rank suffers a wound: Reduce the wounds by one. Tadin suffers a wound.
"Twould seem Genecourt hath allies we did not fathom."

name: Tankard
effect:
Dwarf * May not start in play.
React: Before Tankard suffers a wound, discard a cleric spell from your hand: Reduce the wounds by one.
"Few things are hardier than a drunken dwarf." - Son of Clouds

name: Tempt Hold
effect:
Unique
Spend Order: Once per game, choose one bold trait from this character (other than Warlord) and equip the Tempt Hold to an adjacent character (ignoring requirements): While Temp Hold is equipped, the target character gains that trait.

name: The Cardinal's Blessing
effect:
3 Charges
React: After this character performs an action giving an ATK, AC and/or Skill bonus to another character, remove a Charge token: Increase the bonus (or bonuses) by +5.
Thou art under our protection now, Ygraine.

name: The Emperor's Will
effect:
React: After this wizard succeeds at a save from an opposing character's action: The opposing character must make a magic save with the same DC and the same consequences for failure.
"Denska is Deverenia, now and forever." - Sorceress Ygraine

name: Thrice-Blessed
effect: React: After an opposing character receives a bonus to AC, ATK, and/or Skill from an action: Give one of your characters (up to three characters if this is a Cantor) the same bonuses until the end of the turn.

name: Tzin's Attention
effect:
Mentalists and wizards only.
Spend Order: Target a character up to three ranks away, who must make one Will save (DC 12) for each card in their controlling player's hand. If at least one of them fails, the target suffers a wound, and is spent.

name: Tzin's Secret
effect:
Cursed * Unique * Stealth +0
This character has -1 Hit Point. When this character dies, Tzin's Secret must be equipped to an adjacent character.
"Something to kill for. Something to die for." - Kedric

name: Undead Steed
effect:
Steed
Necromancers may remove from the game a character or Steed in their discard pile to equip Undead Steed from the discard pile as if from your hand.
Order: Spend Undead Steed: Move forward or backward one rank.

name: Urchat
effect:
Mercenary ? Monster ? Stealth +6
May not equip items.
Spend React: Before Urchat dies: All characters within one rank must make a Fortitude save (DC 11) or suffer one wound.

name: Uriel's Armor
effect:
Armor * Good characters only.
React: After a character misses this fighter with a melee strike, spend Uriel's Armor: Perform a skill check (DC 17). If successful, remove a wound from this character.

name: Vakeros
effect:
Nothrog Warlord * Summoner * Riposte +0 * Wyvern Legion
Order: Kill one of your characters in this rank: Perform a ranged strike with a bonus equal to the character's level.
"We all have sacrifices to make."

name: Waking Terrors
effect:
Order: Target an opposing character up to three ranks away who must make a magic save (DC 13, DC 18 if the caster is an Illusionist) or move to the rank behind his army's last rank.
"How curious - Order Genecourt is haunted." - Lord Kestrel

name: Wrong Target
effect:
React: After this character is targeted with a ranged strike: Cancel the strike. If this character is a rogue, you may instead redirect the ranged strike to any character within one rank.
"Well, I guess that explains why Jonah didn't come back." - Jack Casey

name: Wyvern Gem
effect:
3 Charges
React: After this character targets a melee strike, remove a Charge token from Wyvern Gem: This strike inflicts an extra wound if it hits.
"Our men die, but not from their wounds?" - Sceth Hellbringer

name: Wyvern Hammer
effect:
Weapon
This cleric has an ATK bonus equal to the number of other characters in this rank with the same alignment.
"Loyalty is a tool. My tool." - Vakeros

name: Wyvern's Breath
effect:
Nothrog * Siege
May not equip items or attack.
Spend Order: Target a character two ranks away: The target must make a poison save (DC 14). Characters adjacent to the target must make a poison save (DC 9). Characters who fail become spent and suffer a wound.

name: Wyvern's Talon
effect:
Nothrog * Siege * May not equip items.
React: Before Wyvern's Talon performs a melee strike, spend an adjacent Nothrog: Add +4 to the strike. The strike inflicts an additional wound if it hits (3 additional wounds against Siege characters).

name: Xeralis
effect:
Mercenary
React: Before Xeralis dies from a melee or ranged strike: Move the acting character back one rank.
"Ha ha! The Dark Horsemen ride again!"

name: Yazid Alim
effect:
Free Kingdoms * Cantor * Defend +3 * Isadran
React: Before Yazid dies: Your lower level Free Kingdoms characters have +2 ATK and +2 AC until the end of the turn.
"We are more than the unseen."

name: Yedraw
effect:
Mercenary Warlord * Mentalist * Riposte +0
Your entering characters may cause illegal formations if you already have at least one character in the rank. Yedraw's Weapons may not be discarded by opposing players' actions.
Order: Once per turn, remove a bold trait other than "Warlord" from an opposing character for the rest of the turn.
